Alleged boss of Mongrel Mob drug ring in Ōpōtiki is son of gang’s slain president Steve Taiatini https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/alleged-boss-of-mongrel-mob-drug-ring-in-opotiki-is-son-of-gangs-slain-president-steve-taiatini/BUT7NSB6SZHDTMXZ6OASQLJRTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/alleged-boss-of-mongrel-mob-drug-ring-in-opotiki-is-son-of-gangs-slain-president-steve-taiatini/BUT7NSB6SZHDTMXZ6OASQLJRTI/ Jared SavageSteve Taiatini was vocal about dangers of meth before his death. His son has been charged. Fri, 06 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Mikhail Taiatini, right, has taken over as the captain of the Mongrel Mob Barbarians chapter in Opotiki following the death of his father Steven Taiatini, left, last year. The 25-year-old faces numerous drug dealing charges following Operation Highwater. Composite image / NZME
